sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { MapPin, DollarSign, Home, Zap, Calculator, Sun, TrendingUp, Users, Building2, ChevronDown } from 'lucide-react'; const SolarCalculator = () => { const [step, setStep] = useState(1); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ monthlyBill: '', unitRate: '8', roofSize: 'medium', propertyType: 'residential', electricityProvider: '', roofShade: 'no-shade' }); const [results, setResults] = useState(null); const [showResults, setShowResults] = useState(false); const roofSizes = { 'small': { label: 'Small (< 1,000 sq ft)', multiplier: 0.7 }, 'medium': { label: 'Medium (1,000 - 2,000 sq ft)', multiplier: 1.0 }, 'large': { label: 'Large (> 2,000 sq ft)', multiplier: 1.4 } }; const shadeOptions = { 'no-shade': { label: 'Little to no shade', efficiency: 1.0 }, 'some-shade': { label: 'Some shade during the day', efficiency: 0.75 }, 'heavy-shade': { label: 'Heavy shade most of the day', efficiency: 0.45 } }; const calculateSolar = () => { const monthlyBillNum = parseFloat(formData.monthlyBill); const unitRateNum = parseFloat(formData.unitRate); if (!monthlyBillNum || !unitRateNum) return; // Basic calculations based on typical solar metrics const annualUsage = monthlyBillNum * 12 / unitRateNum; // Assuming $0.13/kWh const roofMultiplier = roofSizes[formData.roofSize].multiplier; const shadeEfficiency = shadeOptions[formData.roofShade].efficiency; const systemSize = (annualUsage / 1200) * roofMultiplier * shadeEfficiency; // kW const systemCost = systemSize * 2800; // $2.80/watt installed const federalTaxCredit = systemCost * 0.30; // 30% federal credit const netCost = systemCost - federalTaxCredit; const annualSavings = monthlyBillNum * 12 * 0.95; // Assuming 95% offset const monthlySavings = annualSavings / 12; const paybackPeriod = netCost / annualSavings; // 25-year calculations let totalSavings = 0; for (let year = 1; year <= 25; year++) { const yearlyRate = 0.13 * Math.pow(1.03, year - 1); // 3% annual increase totalSavings += annualUsage * yearlyRate * 0.95; } const netSavings = totalSavings - netCost; setResults({ systemSize: systemSize.toFixed(1), numberOfPanels: Math.ceil(systemSize * 1000 / 400), systemCost: Math.round(systemCost), federalTaxCredit: Math.round(federalTaxCredit), netCost: Math.round(netCost), monthlySavings: Math.round(monthlySavings), annualSavings: Math.round(annualSavings), paybackPeriod: paybackPeriod.toFixed(1), totalSavings: Math.round(totalSavings), netSavings: Math.round(netSavings), co2Offset: Math.round(annualUsage * 0.92 * 25) // lbs CO2 }); setShowResults(true); }; const nextStep = () => { if (step < 3) setStep(step + 1); else calculateSolar(); }; const prevStep = () => { if (step > 1) setStep(step - 1); }; if (showResults) { return (
{/* Header */}

It's My Sun

{/* Results Header */}

Your Solar Estimate

Based on your energy usage in {formData.zipCode}

{/* Key Metrics */}

Monthly Savings

${results.monthlySavings}

Average per month

System Cost

${results.netCost.toLocaleString()}

After federal tax credit

Payback Period

{results.paybackPeriod} years

Break-even point

{/* Detailed Results */}

Solar System Details

System Specifications

System Size: {results.systemSize} kW
Number of Panels: {results.numberOfPanels} panels
Roof Size: {roofSizes[formData.roofSize].label.split('(')[0]}
Shading: {shadeOptions[formData.roofShade].label}

Financial Breakdown

System Cost: ${results.systemCost.toLocaleString()}
Federal Tax Credit: -${results.federalTaxCredit.toLocaleString()}
Net Cost: ${results.netCost.toLocaleString()}
Annual Savings: ${results.annualSavings.toLocaleString()}
{/* Long-term Savings */}

25-Year Financial Impact

Total Savings

${results.totalSavings.toLocaleString()}

Net Profit

${results.netSavings.toLocaleString()}

Environmental Impact: {results.co2Offset.toLocaleString()} lbs of CO₂ offset over 25 years

{/* Call to Action */}

Ready to Go Solar?

Get connected with pre-screened solar installers in your area for free quotes

{/* Disclaimer */}

Disclaimer: These estimates are based on typical installations and may vary based on your specific situation, local incentives, utility rates, and actual energy usage. Final costs and savings will depend on your system design, local regulations, and installation specifics. This calculator is for informational purposes only.

); } return (
{/* Header */}

It's My Sun

Solar Calculator

Step {step} of 3

{/* Progress Bar */}
Progress {Math.round((step/3)*100)}% Complete
{/* Step Content */}
{step === 1 && (

Where are you located?

We'll use your location to calculate local solar potential and incentives

setFormData({...formData, zipCode: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-4 py-3 text-lg border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:border-orange-500 focus:outline-none transition-colors" placeholder="Enter your ZIP code" maxLength="5" /> setFormData({...formData, unitRate: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-4 py-3 text-lg border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:border-orange-500 focus:outline-none transition-colors" placeholder="8" maxLength="5" />
)} {step === 2 && (

What's your monthly electric bill?

This helps us estimate your energy usage and potential savings

$ setFormData({...formData, monthlyBill: e.target.value})} className="w-full pl-8 pr-4 py-3 text-lg border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:border-orange-500 focus:outline-none transition-colors" placeholder="150" />
{['residential', 'commercial'].map((type) => ( ))}
)} {step === 3 && (

Tell us about your roof

This information helps us size your solar system accurately

{Object.entries(roofSizes).map(([key, size]) => ( ))}
{Object.entries(shadeOptions).map(([key, option]) => ( ))}
)}
{/* Navigation Buttons */}
{/* Trust Indicators */}

Trusted by thousands of homeowners

50,000+ estimates
Licensed installers
Free service
); }; export default SolarCalculator;
